path.style: fill:none; fill-opacity:0.75; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke:rgb(30,60,30); stroke-width:1.5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin:miter; stroke-opacity:1; stroke-miterlimit:4; stroke-dasharray:none

fill:black; fill-opacity:0.75; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke:rgb(200,200,200); stroke-width:1.5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin:miter; stroke-opacity:1; stroke-miterlimit:4; stroke-dasharray:none
